name: Binx the Bee
description:
Binx the Bee Prototype

Fly around as little Binx! Rest on a surface to regain flight stamina. Land on a flower to gain some nectar.

Controls:

WASD - Move the bee forward/back and left/right

Mouse - Look around (changes where the bee faces)

Left Click - Shoot nectar (Creates a surface where hit)

Space - Hold to fly!

Build v0.6 (development), 2/28/2022

Adding more flower assets, fixing several dialogue/quest bugs, and adding the bouncy Poppy flower!

Binx is animated and squishy! Platforms expire after about 10 seconds.

Aster Nie
